abstract: Peter Chernin, former president of the News Corporation, is advising Comcast in its bid to acquire a majority stake in NBC Universal, according to executives briefed on the matter.
snippet: Peter Chernin, former president of the News Corporation, is advising Comcast in its bid to acquire a majority stake in NBC Universal, according to executives briefed on the matter.
lead_paragraph: From Tim Arango at Media Decoder:

headline.main: Surprise Adviser for Comcast Bid: Peter Chernin
